cu.explanation_en: Setting global_log_level to 'invalid' is not a valid log level enum (valid options: none, info, annoying), causing logging configuration validation failure.

du.explanation_en: Setting ssPBCH_BlockPower to 100 dBm exceeds the maximum allowed SSB transmit power range (typically -30 to 30 dBm), causing invalid SSB configuration and cell setup error.
du.explanation_zh: 將 ssPBCH_BlockPower 設定為 100 dBm 超過允許的 SSB 傳輸功率範圍（通常為 -30 到 30 dBm），會導致無效的 SSB 配置和細胞設定錯誤。
